meta_description: America’s First Museum of Modern Art
hours_text:
##  Hours & Admission

Monday

**Monday Hours**

**Museum Closed**

**General Admission:**

Adults | $20  
---|---  
Seniors (62+) | $15  
Students and Educators (with ID) | $10  
Military (Active Duty & Retired) | $12  
18 and Under | Free  
Members | Free  
  
**General Admission:**

Advance reservations recommended.

**Members:**

Admission is always free for members without reservation—just check-in at the front desk. [Learn more about membership](/membership)

**Free and Discounted Admission Opportunities:**

[Learn more](/discounts)
